message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be of significant value to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay up to $1,350,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective on the value.  While I'm aiming for a higher price point, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,380,000. I believe this reflects a fair deal considering the potential benefits the product offers. What are your thoughts?
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the flexibility. I am willing to pay $1,360,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will lead us to a mutually beneficial agreement.
